properties.description: This ADF Pipeline, has 2 Steps, 1. Extracts the Snowflake Data to Blob Files and 2. Push the Files from Blob to SFTP Location

activities.name: EP-Snowflake_Extraction
activities.description:
This activity executes the EP-snowflakeExtraction pipeline.
Parameters are passed from the output of enggcontainer_metadata activity.

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of the snowflake table and blob location from khc_enggextract_metadata table which needs to extracted.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_enggextract_metadata where application_name= '@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}' and dataset_group = '@{pipeline().parameters.DatasetGroup}' and active_ind = 'y'

activities.name: SP-PipelineStart_Snowflake
activities.description: This Activity logs starting of pipeline in khc_audit_logÂ table.

activities.name: SP-Success_05
activities.description: This activity logs success of Ep-snowflakeExtraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Success_06
activities.description: This activity logs success of EP-Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-PipelineSucessful_master_pool_extraction_push
activities.description: This Activity logs completion of pipeline in khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: FE_OUTBOUND_FOLDER
activities.description: This activity removes each extract_blob_location folder from outbound folder.

activities.name: Get_Metadata_of_outbound
activities.description: This activity pulls the details of extract_blob_location

activities.name: IF_outbound_folder_exists
activities.description: This activity checks if extract_blob_location folder exists or not.

ifTrueActivities.name: DL_OUTBOUND_FOLDER
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity deletes the extract_blob_location from outbound folder.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Success_03_02_01
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs success of DL_OUTBOUND_FOLDER activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

ifTrueActivities.name: SP-Failure_03_02_01
ifTrueActivities.description: This activity logs failure of DL_OUTBOUND_FOLDER activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Success_03_01
activities.description: This activity logs success of Get_metadata_of_outbound activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Success_03_02
activities.description: This activity logs success of IF_outbound_folder_exists activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_03_01
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Get_Metadata_of_outbound activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_03_02
activities.description: This activity logs failure of IF_outbound_folder_exists activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Success_04
activities.description: This activity logs success of FE_OUTBOUND_FOLDER activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_03
activities.description: This activity logs failure of LU-Metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_04
activities.description: This activity logs failure of FE_OUTBOUND_FOLDER activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_01
activities.description: This activity logs failure of Get_kroger_app_orchestration_metadata activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_05
activities.description: This activity logs failure of EP-Snowflake_Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: SP-Failure_06
activities.description: This activity logs failure of EP-Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction activity in khc_audit_log_detail table and failure of pipeline in  khc_audit_log table.

activities.name: Get_us_retailer_app_orchestration_metadata
activities.description: This activity pulls the details related to orchestration_metadata(parameter_json) process.

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from khc_orchestration_metadata where application_name = '@{pipeline().parameters.ApplicationName}' and dataset_group = '@{pipeline().parameters.DatasetGroup}' and  active_ind  ='y'

activities.name: WB-SendFailureEmail01
activities.description: It send Failure Email alert

activities.name: WB-SendFailureEmail02
activities.description: It send Failure Email alert

activities.name: WB-SendFailureEmail03
activities.description: It send Failure Email alert

activities.name: WB-SendFailureEmail04
activities.description: It send Failure Email alert

activities.name: WB-SendFailureEmail05
activities.description: It send Failure Email alert

activities.name: WB-SendSuccessEmail
activities.description: It send Successfull Email alert

activities.name: ForEach Metadata Entry
activities.description: This activity is to create a dummy file if no files available after extraction

activities.name: EP-SubDummyFileCreationPipeline
activities.description: This pipeline is used to invoke PL_KHCDE_US_SALES_SUB_DUMMY_FILE_CREATION .

activities.name: IS_SFTP_Y
activities.description: Checks whether the  Input combination given to Pipeline is valid or not.

ifTrueActivities.name: EP-Blob_To_SFTP_Extraction
ifTrueActivities.description:
This pipeline executes the generic_blob_to_sftp push pipeline.
Parameters are passed from pipeline parameters.

activities.name: SP-Success_03
activities.description: This activity logs success of  LU-MetaData activity in khc_audit_log_detail table.
